channel.title: Help
channel.description: I would like to use your name "mopar" In a site I am creating for this sort of purpose advertising servers. But, before I broadcast it to much I want to make sure I have the right to from you guys. my site is "runemopar". If there is a copyright I will delete the site. [size=36pt]wasn't sure where to post[/size]

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Ask mitb directly don’t post (PM function) as for copyright you should be more concerned about http://www.mopar.com/

Read full topic
